import { Meta, Story, Preview, Props } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import { State, Store } from "@sambego/storybook-state";
import { action } from '@storybook/addon-actions';
import { text, withKnobs } from '@storybook/addon-knobs';

import Headline from './Headline';

export const headlineStore = new Store({
  subtitle: "A subtitle belonging to the Headline. Such item can contain lenghty text.",
  text: "Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.",
  title: "A title of the Headline",
});

export const onHeadlineUpdate = (payload) => { 
  action('onHeadlineUpdate')(payload);
  headlineStore.set(payload);
}

<Meta title="Components/Headline" />

# Headline

`@import { Headline } from '@storycopter/ui';`

## Props

<Props of={Headline} />

## Variations

    <Headline

      text="Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry."
      title="A title of the Headline"
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>

<Preview>
  <Story name="variations">
    <Headline
      align="center"
      cover={true}
      color="white"
      backgImage={{
        name: "sample.jpg",
        fixed: {
          base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
          height: 900,
          src: "sample.jpg",
          srcSet: "sample.jpg 1x,sample.jpg 1.5x,sample.jpg 2x",
          width: 1400
        },
      }}
      maskColor="rgba(0,0,0,0.3)"
      subtitle="A subtitle belonging to the Headline. Such item can contain lenghty text."
      text="Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry."
      textColor="white"
      title="A title of the Headline"
      updateSelf={(payload) => console.log("updateSelf(): ", payload)}
    />
  </Story>
</Preview>

<Preview>
  <Story name="editable">
    <State store={headlineStore}>
      {state => 
        <Headline
        backgImage={{
          name: "sample.jpg",
          fixed: {
            base64: "data:image/jpeg;base64,",
            height: 900,
            src: "sample.jpg",
            srcSet: "sample.jpg 1x,sample.jpg 1.5x,sample.jpg 2x",
            width: 1400
          },
        }}
        isEditable
        maskColor="rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"
        onElementUpdate={onHeadlineUpdate}
        subtitle={state.subtitle}
        text={state.text}
        textColor="#ffffff"
        title={state.title}
      />
      }
    </State>
  </Story>
</Preview>
